Watch: India’s unsung forest heroes: the Van Rakshaks protecting our wild
description: A new Wildlife Trust of India report, “Guardians of the Wild,” highlights the courage and sacrifices of Van Rakshaks, the nation’s frontline forest guards. Guarding over 1,100 Protected Areas, these rangers work under dangerous and under-equipped conditions, with India recording the world’s highest number of forest staff fatalities. Released at the IUCN World Conservation Congress in Abu Dhabi, the report is a call to recognise and protect those who guard India’s forests, the true guardians of the wild

description: Thinking Machines Lab, co-founded by Mira Murati, has lost co-founder Andrew Tulloch to Meta Platforms. Tulloch, a former Meta employee and AI researcher, rejoined Mark Zuckerberg's expanding AI division after a brief period at the startup.  Thinking Machines Lab stated they remain focused on their mission despite this departure.

title: Josh Allen reveals he cried watching Hailee Steinfeld’s scenes in ‘Sinners’
description: Buffalo Bills quarterback Josh Allen shared his deep admiration for his wife Hailee Steinfeld's acting in her new film 'Sinners'. Allen admitted to becoming emotional watching Steinfeld's performance, highlighting his pride in her talent. The couple, married in May 2025, skillfully balance their demanding careers. Steinfeld often adjusts her schedule to support Allen's NFL season, demonstrating their mutual dedication.

title: Palestinian influencer Saleh al-Jafarawi killed in Gaza
description: Gaza influencer Saleh al-Jafarawi, known as 'Mr FAFO,' reportedly died amid factional clashes. He gained notoriety for celebrating the October 7th attack and later faced accusations of misappropriating donation funds. His death has sparked mixed reactions, with Israelis viewing him as a propagandist and pro-Palestinian activists mourning a documented voice of struggle.

title: Indian-origin Subu Vedam arrested by ICE moments after release; to be deported
description: An Indian-origin man in Pennsylvania, freed after 43 years for a murder he didn't commit, was immediately detained by ICE on a decades-old deportation order. Subramanyam Vedam, who arrived in the US as an infant, faces deportation to India, a country he barely knows. His family is protesting, highlighting his wrongful conviction.

title: Cyber war alert: NSE hit by 40cr attacks in a day during Op Sindoor; AI used
description: The National Stock Exchange (NSE) combats an estimated 170 million daily cyberattacks with a dedicated team and advanced systems. During 'Operation Sindoor,' the exchange successfully repelled a record 400 million attacks, showcasing its robust defense mechanisms against threats like DDoS. This highlights the critical need for continuous investment in cyber defense to protect financial market infrastructure.

title: Digital rights debate: SC rejects doctor’s WhatsApp plea; suggests using Zoho’s Arattai
description: India's Supreme Court has ruled that access to private messaging platforms like WhatsApp is not a fundamental right. The court dismissed a doctor's plea to restore her blocked account, emphasizing users must adhere to platform policies. It suggested alternatives like Zoho's Arattai app, which has seen a surge in popularity.
